name: querysurge-run-suite-task
description: Runs a Test Suite in a Scenario and optionally waits for completion
author: RTTS

inputs.name: host
inputs.label: QuerySurge hostname
inputs.helpMarkDown: Hostname/FQDN/IP address of QuerySurge server (ex. qs.mycorp.com)

inputs.name: projectId
inputs.label: Project ID #
inputs.helpMarkDown: ID # of Project (found in Global Adminstration -> Projects)

inputs.name: suiteId
inputs.label: Test Suite ID #
inputs.helpMarkDown: ID # of Test Suite to run

inputs.name: scenarioName
inputs.label: Scenario Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of scenario (to identify scenario in the Run Dashboard)

inputs.name: appendTime
inputs.label: Append Time
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether the date/time will be appended to the scenario name

inputs.name: pollingEnabled
inputs.label: Poll for Completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to wait until the scenario completes execution, and pass/fail the task based on scenario outcome (pass or fail/error)
